title: The remarkable experience at St Regis!
desc: It is one the best hotels I have visited. People here all are well mannered and good behaved. The service was just amazing. Every one was just a call away for any sort of assistance required. I'd definitely share and take back all the moments here to my country.

title: Wonderful stay with great customer service. Good location to Orchard and Tanglin Mall. Diversified breakfast
desc: - Spacious bathroom - Front office lady (Ms. Suyikin) was so helpful and friendly from the first time we checked in. All staff is really nice with smiles all the time. - Breakfast is cooked with healthy ingredients. All of our requests were served quickly. My children enjoyed everyday breakfast with hot/ice chocolate. Staff is always ready to clean our table and is so attentive to guests, especially Mr. Kamal. - I really love the toilet amenities brand Laboratoire Remede. The smell is very comforting. - Near Tanglin Mall where we can find imported goods. Thank you so much for giving us a wonderful stay during first days of Lunar New Year. We must come back when we visit Singapore.

title: Too good to be true
desc: From the moment we entered the hotel lobby, we were impressed. The interior decor was luxurious yet warm and inviting. The hotel restaurant has a stunning interior as well. We were able to have a relaxing breakfast, the food was delicious and top-notch. The staff of Astor Bar was excellent and pleasant. They were very welcoming and accommodating, efficient and attentive, specially to this girl name Christianne, everyone was caring about our needs to ensure that we were enjoying our stay. I would definitely recommend The St, Regis Hotel as it is a great place for guests to relax and enjoy themselves.

title: Daily Aperitivo Hour @ Astor Bar
desc: Did a staycaytion over the weekend at St Regis, and would love to commend the team on their hospitality and warmth extended while we are there. From the front-desk to room service staff, porters and guest services; everyone we met greeted us with a smile and was quick to help and attend to us. We enjoyed ourselves at Astor bar too, which despite us being there for the Daily Aperitivo Hour (which was complimentary), the service rendered to us by Winty and her colleagues made us feel really welcomed. Looking forward to coming back again to stay!

title: Epitome of luxury
desc: This hotel is stunning and the service is impeccable. We got an upgrade to a deluxe room which was gorgeous. Super comfortable bed and bathroom. Wish we got to spend time more time there. The cocktail bar is very nice with wonderful wonderful service.

title: St. Regis/Singapore/2023
desc: I am currently visiting Singapore, and have been staying at St. Regis for the last 5 days. I will be very sad leaving this wonderful hotel tomorrow. I have travelled around the world, and had excellent service from hotel staff. This hotel itself is excellent, but the staff have been fantastic. If you are fortunate enough to stay here, please ask for Executive butler Ramesh Pavadai for the special art tour. His guide made the experience even more special.

title: 5 star service, 5 star food, 5 star experience
desc: Fantastic service standards, provided assistance to the wedding couple every step of the way and even went the extra mile to accommodate some of the requests! Food during the banquet was great and the ambience of the ballroom was majestic!

title: There is no other choice!
desc: My absolute favorite place to stay in Singapore. Stayed her years ago on my honeymoon, It didn't disappoint then, and doesn't disappoint now. The staff is friendly, food good, rooms imaculate and location is is central to everything.

title: Pleasant stay overall, with minor problems
desc: It was a smooth check-in process and the staff was very friendly. Beautiful hotel, although the inside of the lifts do look a bit tired (same for the room). For the room, it looks beautiful. We were served hot chocolate for two as a welcome drink of sorts, and it tasted great. The room is spotless. Complimentary tea and coffee were provided, along with 4 bottles of water. There were also a minibar with snacks and mini bottles of alcohol (all chargeable). As mentioned, the room did look a bit tired with certain parts of the wallpaper (hidden from plain view) peeling off. Bathroom was gorgeous! Came with 2 sinks and a bathtub in middle, plus a small walk-in wardrobe, toilet and shower. Toiletries were provided, like hair conditioner, shampoo, body soap, body moisturiser,

title: Perfect
desc: Everything was perfect. How is that even possible? The room was lovely. The bathroom was a palace. The beds wonderful. But the real highlight was the breakfast buffet. Made to order food without having to stand in the omelet line. All sorts of stations with an enormous variety of food. DO NOT MISS IT.

title: JISU is very kind and awesome. She couldn't be better. :) I fee happy due to her kindness.
desc: JISU is very kind and awesome. She couldn't be better. :) I fee happy due to her kindness. I am looking forward to next trip for singapore. Hotel service was awesome. :) I like hotel and room which is very clean and nice service.

title: Extremely irresponsible and dishonest over excess charges
desc: I feel really sorry that I have to write this review as I have stayed at your amazing property multiple times and it has been nothing less than perfect before this extremely disappointing incident. In March 2023, I was billed for 2 nights after a 1-night stay. Since then, I have called the hotel at least 5 times. Each time, I was assured that I would receive a refund of the overcharge in a few days. A week or two would fly by without me receiving anything and I would call for an update, only to have to repeat my entire story to a different member of the staff. It has been almost 6 weeks since the incident, and I have yet to get any response from any of the 5 different staff members that promised to follow up. At first, I convinced myself it could have been a one-off overlook,

title: The best stay in this trip
desc: We've visited many hotels that tell us that they are 5* but this is the one of the hotels which also really feels like that. Location wise, it is not exactly in the middle of where the shopping places are. I rather take the place one block off which means that the hotel is decently well situated but still quiet. Service was as expected from the StRegis name. I won't say the best, and improvements can always be there. Most staff are helpful, gracious and welcoming. But the best were the doormen. Rooms are large compared to many other places even starting from the standard offering. There is no need to have a larger one for an extra price. Butler service is something which makes you feel special and they are quite fast. As a member I should get an upgrade. They tell how much

title: Top tier service
desc: Luxury hotel with spacious room. Excellent service and very nice breakfast. Every staff carry a smiling face who is very willing to offer help. It‚Äôs a bit far away from the city centre. The swimming pool is a bit small.

title: Friday couple lunch
desc: The food was excellent. We have the lobster bisque (I would come back just for thisü§§), the burrata salad, Normandy oysters for starters, and the Steak and Lamb Rack for mains. Food was cooked to perfection. The service staff, Jisu was extremely attentive and friendly. Highly recommend!

title: Jisu ‚ô°‚ô°‚ô° at St. Regis Singapore
desc: This hotel has all the creature comforts and is worth a return visit. Jisu, who I have met at St. Regis Singapore, was friendly and attentive. She is the kindest person that I've ever met in this trip.

title: Top quality venue and team!
desc: Engaged St Regis for a corporate award ceremony event in March 2023. We were very blown away by the high service quality displayed, definitely would recommend St Regis as a top choice for companies who wish to host their corporate events. Special shout out to Garen and team for always being at the top of their game and ensuring that operations were ran smoothly with excellence!

title: My best friend‚Äôs wedding
desc: my best friend held her wedding here. Was the emcee for the wedding event and Ken was so helpful throughout. It was early in the morning and he made us cafe lattes upon request. The food was great and service was top notch. Great place to hold a wedding!

title: Excellent Service and Food
desc: Had a wonderful dining experience at Yan Ting. Bruce, Yong Zhe is very friendly and their service was marvellous. The way the food was presented is very appealing. Food quality was excellent as well. We all enjoyed our meal at Yan Ting.

title: Best wedding ever
desc: Joy, Jayden and Ken offered the best possible service one could expect at a wedding dinner. The attention to detail and thoughtfulness is the standard of wedding service in the industry. Appreciate their service

title: Great Service
desc: A million thanks to Ken Tan and Jolyn Wong from the Banquet Team of St Regis Singapore for their professionalism and superlative skills. We appreciate their speedy and efficiency service that has made our event to be successful.

title: Perfect stay at the St.Regis Singapore
desc: The hotel is very well situated but quiet. Rooms are well appointed and the free ironing service (2 pieces per day) very handy. 24h butler service well appreciated too. The bed is very comfortable and the blackout blinds are perfect. The food is very good. Breakfast buffet has everything you could wish for with Asian and Western fare, vegetarian choices and also a menu for extras like eggs, pancakes, etc. The Chinese restaurant was a wonderful culinary experience. But the shining stars are the staff‚Ä¶they are all warm , welcoming and cannot do enough for you. Special shout-out to the gentleman at the door, always helpful to find a taxi or give information and the efficient staff at the front desk. Kamal the sous chef, Saravanan the busboy and Inna who remembered my jasmine tea

title: Exponentially Wonderful Experience!!!
desc: As always, a SUPER pleasant experience. Was there to celebrate my wife birthday with Sunday Champagne Brunch. I would especially like to highlight the splendid level of service quality provided by Jisu!!! What an experience with her delicate, caring and attention to detail service! Thanks much Jisoo! Keep up the superb job!!!

title: it was a nice experience to stay at here. the service was so adorable! and the one that named SARAVANANwas very nice
desc: it was a nice experience to stay at here. the service was so adorable! and the one that named SARAVANAN was very nice to help me when i need something to get for breakfast. thankyou? definitely will be back!

title: Amazing birthday dinner at Brasseries La Saveurs
desc: Had a birthday celebration at Brasserie Les Saveurs to celebrate my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday and was blown away by both the amazing food (the steak was melt in your mouth!) and service by Kartie and his team. Thank you for preparing the surprise birthday cake in advance as well!

title: Putting wrong bill in put account
desc: Guys plz check the bills before leaving. They took a security deposit of 800 dollars. When we were checking out they put a wrong bill of breakfast. We told them that its not ours so they rechecked and cancelled it. But then they put another bill of 245 dollars of dinner which was again not ours. Inspite of calling them daily nothing is happening. They are just saying that they will revert but its been 5 days not getting call from them. Not expected such cheap behaviour from such a property.

title: Great Stay
desc: I had an super last minute impromtu staycation at St Regis Singapore and it was a fantastic stay. Rooms are well furnished and ideal location, just at the outskirts of Orchard Road. We were greeted warmly by Hafiz who checked us in and he was fantastic. He was very attentive and really personalized the check in process. As I was wearing an Arsenal jersey during check in, we clicked over our love for football, although he is a Man Utd Fan (BOOOOO!! hahaha). As we checked in very late, he was kind enough to extend our checkout time and also highlighted places for us to have a late supper. Another staff we wish to extend our thank is Jia Hui and the concierge/bellman. Both was excellent, unfortunetely I overlooked on getting the bellman's name. Will certainly revisit St Regis for

title: Still the classiest address, thanks to Kartie Gunuzalan, Yat Thein, and Chef Wendy Wee
desc: In the third month of 2023 and already had a few excellent stays. On my most recent stay, greeted upon arrival by doormen Raheem and Ali, while check-in was facilitated by Front Office Manager Candy Zhang-Vijayakumar and Front Desk Representative Tiara, Jia Hui, Assistant Front Office Manager Yvonne, and duty manager Kash. Greeted in the lobby by Quality Manager, Marianne Teo. My room had been set up as per my preferences communicated to Candy during my previous stay. Thanks to the floor housekeepers, in particular, Mike and Anna, as well as Executive Housekeeper Jacqueline and Housekeeping manager, Rachel The next morning, greeted by Executive Chief Butler Ramesh and butler Hanafi in the lobby. Had a fantastic lunch of escargots and Pork Hor Fun, especially curated by the

title: Terrible experience; do not recommend
desc: You would expect more from such a reputable brand but a staycation here turned out to be a terrible experience. Despite requesting for a baby crib 5 months ahead of our stay, none was forthcoming - 6 hours after checking in we were told they had run out of cribs. Worst part was our room lock was spoilt and nothing was done for more than 3 hours. After determining that the lock could not be fixed on the spot, we had to wait nearly 2 hours to get a new room. Hotel was equally non-responsive upon receiving our feedback. Avoid a nightmare if you're planning a nice getaway.

title: Thanks Daniel!
desc: St. Regis is an amazing hotel. We had a lovely time. We especially appreciated the concierge, Daniel, who made our stay extra easy and special. He arrange transportation for us and was super friendly to our children. We will be back!

title: Successful event
desc: An excellent banquet team to handle various requests with a great flexibility. The staffs are able to accomodate and work well with the organizing committee in planning and delivering the program. Blessie Marques and Thiynaggaran has led the banquet team well.

title: Seamless! And Gobi (concierge) was the cherry on the cake
desc: Seamless experience! Check in process was extremely efficient and fast. Agile and responsive teams in all areas. Great rooms, excellent breakfast. But the main highlight, Gobi from the concierge team who is a true gem.

title: Excellent service at wedding lunch
desc: The service rendered was excellent and meticulous. The staff were very conscientious with their service towards my daughter when we were attending a wedding lunch. When they saw my daughter at the table, they stepped forward to check if she needs special cutlery and any soft drinks for her. The staff also stepped forward to assure us that there was special arrangement for food for her.

title: Wedding Reception at St Regis
desc: I attended a wedding reception at St Regis today. The food and service were great. Cheska and Chris did a great job in ensuring that the guests have a good time there. We enjoyed ourselves very much.

title: Home Away From Home
desc: Stayed here for 9 days and had a wonderful time! The service was excellent and Saravanan was always kind at breakfast helping my family with everything. Chef Kamal always had a smile on his face and make great food. The hotel offered children story books that we would borrow for our 4 year old, happy hour from 3-6, and were always very polite. The doormen were always friendly and helpful in getting taxi‚Äôs which was harder than we thought in Singapore.

title: 6 Stars
desc: Our stay @ St Regis Hotel over exceeded our high expectations already with regards the rooms, food and most especially customer service. We would like to highlight the exceptional service of the fine gentlemen in the Concierge group led by Daniel and Edward and their colleagues Gobi, Raja, Arasu and Sam. Highly recommended and will definitely return on our next trip to SGP.

title: Best host at breakfast
desc: Excellent excellent service from Saravanan all breakfast, very attentive. Had an great sleep and amazing room service at 1 am when I arrived from the airport. All dreams and wishes are thought of and attained

title: Honeymoon at St. Regis!
desc: The service at Sg. Regis Singapore is exceptional, Saravanan in particular paid such good attention to us during breakfast, ensuring that we had all our things in order. Kudos to him! The breakfast spread is really good as well, with a wide variety of western to Asian to choose from.

title: Excellent service and great food
desc: Went to Brasserie Les Saveurs for celebration dinner. The environment was great and the food was delicious. The staff Kartie was extremely helpful and considerate. In between the chef came for greeting. One of the best experiences in SG. Will definitely repeat again.

title: Wedding Lunch - Caroline Mansion
desc: We held our wedding lunch in St. Regis Caroline Mansion. The venue was spectacular and food was amazing. We were hosted by Ken, Michelle, Sofia and Kim in the preparation and the wedding itself. They were excellent in service and execution, and highly meticulous in ensuring our needs and those of our guests are met. Thank you team for the hard work to make our wedding a success!

title: Sunday brunch
desc: Very tentative and courteous service by Saravanan! He made sure to always make sure that we were happy and fed well. My mother and I had such a good time and the food was also of amazing quality and variety. The dessert spread was most enjoyable.

title: Great Time at St. Regis Singapore
desc: The hotel infrastructure is excellent! The gym is very complete and with new machines. There‚Äôs a big variety on the breakfast options and the crew is very friendly and helpfull. Shoutout to Gobi, the best Host in Singapore!

title: its a shylokian and Heartless hotel
desc: This is one of the most heartless hotel i have visited where they treat their "Guests" as objects. Absolutely contrary to their moto, the Innkeepers at the St Regis Singapore have lost the fundamentals of "Hospitality". There are several reasons why one should choose plethora of hotel nearby and not the St Regis at Singapore: 1) Its at a very uncomfortable distance. The minimum one way walk is about 1.1-1.2 Kms to reach anywhere. That distance is such that all modes of transport are uncomfortable (unless ofcourse you have a chauffer driven car at your disposal). The walk is enjoyable once but if you have to do it 2-3 times daily, it becomes a punishment. As you go towards the orchard road, several several choices open up and "perhaps" they might be little hospitable too! 2)

title: Credit to Ken & Sofia
desc: I was attending my friend's wedding today. There was 2 service crews named Ken and Sofia, they were being very helpful and friendly to fulfill my request. Hence, I write in to credit them and I hope to see them again for my next visit. Thanks.

title: A wonderful stay
desc: Our experience in St.Regis was amazing! Everything was perfect and the service was very good. Saravanan helped us during our breakfast everyday with a wonderful and atencious service. We definetely recommend St Regis and Saranavan!!!!

title: Treated like a king!
desc: They have the best : Location Food Service Bed! Centrally located at Orchard area and walkable to the best malls, restaurants and attractions. They house best restaurants. Must try the tempura restaurant and their in house chicken wings are to die for ! :)

title: Mix feelings
desc: My husband and I booked a penthouse suite for 2 nights on our wedding weekend. We arrived at the hotel at 5.30pm, 2 hrs after the 3pm check in time. To our astonishment, we were told that our room wasn't ready and we had to wait for another 30mins. Naturally, we were very upset and the conceirge kept making excuses to why they were late. This made me even more upset as it is not the customer's problem. The room should be ready at 3pm for check in as the check out time is 12pm. Why does it take another 6 hrs to get one room ready? We were standing there, waiting with my heavy wedding gown, and luggages. It was very frustrating having to wait and wait and wait. The conceirge attending to us seemed very inexperienced and sat there clicking on his laptop as if he was trying to

title: Food & Service was the Hallmark at St Regis
desc: Amazing Food at brasserie les saveurs and Impeccable service as well, provided by Saravanan. Carefully and Meticulous effort provided, sums up a 5 star dining experience @ St Regis. A definitely top of the list, to visit dining venues for 2023.

title: 2 days 1 night stay at St Regis, Singapore
desc: Hotel room is awesome. Yellowish lightning compliments the classy design of the room, which gives out an extraordinary peaceful experience. Breakfast experience was great as well. Restaurant was super ATAS. Food was good, with exceptionally fast service. Even have Chef Kamal, Zi How and team making intentional effort to interact with us, ensuring that we get the most out of our breakfast experience.

title: Friendly Staff
desc: The staffs were very friendly and helpful. Would like to personally thank the lobby attendant especially Mr Raja. Thank you for your service Mr Raja, a very kind and helpful person. Love the soft toy that was given to me for my daughter by Mr Raja. Love the breakfast and room itself. Would definitely stay at St Regis again.

title: Just amazing impeccable attention to service
desc: Love this place. Amazing rooms so quiet calm, well lit, large bathrooms, all controls at nightstand and they all work, amazing teak burlwood furniture, great service. Specially at b fast. Kamal Hoeussin was extremely helpful in that he would get me masala tea every morning made my day. Thank you very much

title: Wedding at St Regis
desc: I attend and help my friend wedding at St Regis as a bridesmaid. Ken the banquet manager, was very helpful to our inquiries about table arrangement and cleanliness. Will recommend friends to held a wedding here.

title: Breakfast at The Drawing Room
desc: Nice breakfast on Mother‚Äôs Day at The Drawing Room at Hotel St Regis. We had Egg benedict, dim sum basket, char Kueh teow, coffee. Excellent service by Mescon! Mescon has been very attentive and caring.

title: Beautiful Hotel with Great Service
desc: This is a beautiful hotel. I arrived at 230 am and my taxi was immediately greeted by a staff member. The check in process was easy and fast. My room is stunning and I especially love the sheets! The international breakfast buffet is good, but the coffee is great. I am staying here for 11 days (business) so I am looking forward to my experience. I will say that the servers at the breakfast have already made a very positive impression. They are warm and friendly.

title: A great stay marred by experience at the check-in and bellhop which were not becoming of a 6 star hotel
desc: Stayed here over the long Labour Day weekend in May 2023 with my wife and my 15month toddler. Granted, the stay was utilised through a complimentary hotel voucher from my credit card, the stay was great marred by 1 incident which left a bad taste in my mouth - something that I thought would not happen at a 6 star hotel/ First, the negatives, upon check-in at 1pm, I was told by one staff member that I was given a free upgrade to a larger room on the top few floors (#19 floor) & a baby cot (which I had requested and the request was acknowledged via e-mail prior to check-in) was already in the room but I had to wait to 3pm as the housekeeping was still cleaning the room. Fast forward to 3pm, another person at the check-in counter mentioned that the previous room was given to

title: Wedding at Caroline‚Äôs Mansion, St Regis
desc: My wife and I had our wedding banquet at Caroline‚Äôs Mansion, St Regis. We initially chose it due to its sleek and modern interior, as well as luxurious food menu. No regret choosing St Regis to celebrate our big day. We had an amazing celebration full of beautiful moments that we won‚Äôt forget. Really impressed with the work and service of St Regis team, especially the small details that we didn‚Äôt think of such as lighting arrangements. Shout out to the whole team of St Regis, but specially for: 1. Michelle Fong, our event manager, who took all our requests, many last minute, and did her best. We gave a not so nice review after our food testing, but she worked hard with the chef to turn it around. Our guests praise the food. 2. Ken, the banquet manager. He was very helpful

title: Birthday Stay at St Regis
desc: Great attention to detail and feel welcoming. Though the hotel is more than 15 years old. It did not feel the age Special mention to Bessie. We have a dinner at Brasserie Les Saveurs. She is very attentive and help us entertain our playful 2 yr old girl

title: Great hotel, including a pleasant spot for mid morning coffee with fine service.
desc: I had a great experience in the drawing room having a nice coffee, with excellent service from Saravanan. He was attentive and very helpful. I travel a lot, and coffee service is often overlooked. Not with Saravanan!

title: Wedding Banquet and overnight stay
desc: My wife and I held our wedding at St Regis and the team, Christine Jiayu and Garan were really helpful and thoughtful throughout our stay at St Regis. It was an unforgettable experience only made possible because of them!

title: Amazing Hotel and Great Location
desc: An amazing hotel, very specious rooms and toilets. We are a family of 4 (2 adults and 2 kids). I loved everything about it. The service was great from the start till the end. Every single staff member we came across is very friendly and takes the extra mile to help or assist if needed. Concierge and Butler services are great. The pool is nice, my only comment is that I would‚Äôve loved it to stay open more late than it is as a tourist whose outside the majority of the day. It‚Äôs located right at the corner of Orchard Road that has lots of shopping places/malls.

title: Fantastic stay
desc: Had an absolutely fantastic stay. Everything from the rooms, staff, restaurant area, amenities, all are top-notch. Checkin & Checkout was smooth and easy. Was upgraded to the Lady Astor Room and it had 2 double beds convenient enough for our Kids. It begins from the moment you walk into your room. The lights, temperature are all optimal. Elegant music on the stereo. Welcome snack and fruits on the table. 10/10 cleanliness, could not find a single fault. I have stayed in many luxury hotels. What sets this hotel apart is the attention to details. Sometimes a hotel can seem like luxury, by using premium finishings and furniture. But upon closer inspection, many things will seem like an afterthought and randomly tossed together. St Regis is so much beyond that.

title: Nice experience dinning.
desc: service staffs are good and friendly! one of the chef even came out and interact with us. Chef Lai came and explain the dish we are having. very friendly. good to see chef coming out cause hardly see them in most restaurants we been too. Food are great too!

title: Always had a great experience here!
desc: One of my favorite restaurant to dine in. Great ambiance, super delicious food by Chef Mark who also come to greet us to ensure that we enjoyed our dinner! Not forgetting the service staffs were very attentive and friendly

title: St. Regis delivered impeccable service.
desc: Brasserie Les Saveurs and Astor Bar are hidden gems in the bustling city. The impeccable experience celebrating my father's birthday was made possible by Anne's warmth and Juvan's attention to detail. Astor Bar's cozy ambiance and delightful cocktails, along with Christianne's expertise, created an unforgettable evening.

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: Great all around, breakfast buffet is a mix of a la carte and buffet. Chef Kamal is very skilled, kind and attentive. excellent butler service, Kumar Pakirisamy and teammates, always are able to help with my any needs.

title: The best hotel ever
desc: We stayed for four nights there. This is the best hotels we‚Äôve ever stayed for our entire life! All staffs working there were so kind and constantly paid attention to us. Especially, a cleaning staff named Joseph did everything to make our room confortable. In addition, when I get carsick, one of the bellboys was trying to get something for me to get better. Their service were so heartwarming. We hope to stay again at St. Regis soon!

title: French food
desc: Each dish presented is a testament to their remarkable skill and passion for creating unforgettable flavors. A visit to this restaurant is a must for anyone seeking an extraordinary dining experience.

title: Great Sunday brunch at St. Regis
desc: Had the Sunday brunch at St. Regis. There's a wide spread of food (cold cuts, seafood on ice, sashimi, sushi, cheese and bread, salads, desserts) and choice of main course. The cod fish was really good. Staff is also attentive and checks on the table now and then. Drinks are free -flow and depends on whether you are getting the alcoholic or non-alcoholic package. Overall a good brunch to kick off a lazy Sunday afternoon!

title: Expect Luxurious Comfort at St Regis
desc: A 36 hour layover in between flights lasting almost as long requires some pampering and this is a good choice to get that in Singapore. I was allowed to check-in at 10a, received a 4p check-out as a Titanium member and appreciated that most of all. Breakfast options were un-ending and the view from my suite (1501) was superb. Common areas and lounge were also nice. I have no complaints but will note the Butler service was difficult to reach and the Men's Spa facilities were dated and only partially functional.

title: Outstanding Stay
desc: Great stay with a lovely room, delicious breakfasts, and attentive servers and staff who learned our names and quickly provided anything we requested; butler service in the mornings from Yoges was outstanding. Pool great for kids or for relaxing.

title: Dinner at Astor Grill
desc: Had dinner at Astor Grill. Ambience and lighting at the restaurant gives out a very luxurious vibe. Service staffs were passionate in their role to serve us, especially Kartie and Jovan. We even have Chefs (Wendy and Yongjia) personally serving us the dishes, which was quite an unique experience. Main course (Tenderloin- medium rare) we ordered was simply mouth-watering. Starters and appetisers were delicious too. Halfway through our meal, the Chef (Angelo) who prepared our dishes also came to our table to ensure that we enjoyed our dinner, which shows his passion as a Chef in his food quality. Overall, a wonderful experience.

title: Lovely dessert.
desc: Very sumptuous lunch. The pork ribs were very soft and juicy, including the cartilages. The king prawns were really huge. The osmanthus jelly with yuzu sherbet were really a great pair and appetising.

title: Positive Sunday Brunch Experience
desc: Great service overall. Saravanan is very friendly and made our Sunday brunch dining experience very positive! Quality of food is great! The seafood is very fresh but food eg. Lobster could be replenished at a much faster pace. The chef walk around could be served at a much frequent interval.

title: Retro vibe, modern finish. Exceptional service
desc: Hotel has a nice retro vibe without being dated Stayed in the suite which is huge and great for families Im a fan of the facilities provided, especially the fragrance of the cleanser! Breakfast was exceptional, especially the epicurean omelette and pastries. Service was impeccable as well; I was served by Saravanan. However, the queue outside the restaurant was really long at 9am+... So I wonder if these folks will get to have their breakfast :(

title: Excellent service from an awesome brand name
desc: Was at The St. Regis Singapore JOHN JACOB Ballroom for a Wedding Banquet lunch on 22JUL23. Had a great experience. First, the food were awesome. Enjoyed every dishes that was served to us. The food probably wouldn‚Äôt taste as nice if they won‚Äôt served well by the service crew. The service crew were very attentive and delivered excellent service. Especially a particular waiter named Keegan. He was very attentive. Proactive in his service. Before I could asked for more wines or tea he immediately could preempted my needs. Such are great service that anyone would appreciate from such a top notch hotel. Glad that St Regis employed the right service staff. Keegan took the extra mile to ensure that all guests were comfortable and constantly attended to. Service from the heart could

title: Opulent ambience but really poor service
desc: We have recently been guests for 6 nights. It‚Äôs been poor experience from F n B room service experience. After our night safari we placed an order for a late dinner( from the limited menu) and the food hadn‚Äôt arrived even an hour later. Checked with in-room dining and they said ‚Äúthey had other guests and food was being prepared would take 20 minutes.‚Äù Another half hour later- they said it would take another 20 minutes. At that point we called the duty manager to look into it. The duty manager apologised that the order was not processed at all! We finally got our food delivered to our room at 1 am and their only apology was waiving off the dinner charges for their poor service. In that sense Dominos is better than St Regis room service. We ordered burgers and pizza on Grab for

title: Great hotel and wonderful service
desc: We had a wonderful stay at the St Regis hotel last week. The attention to detail was brilliant and the service was fantastic. All the staff were extremely attentive, friendly and nothing was too much trouble. Would also like to say a big shout out to Nicholas who checked us in and was very welcoming. We loved the Aston bar we enjoyed a delicious cocktail. The location of the hotel is also great to access lots of things nearby. The only thing they could do with a pool bar so we could enjoy some drinks whilst by the pool, apart from that we had a great stay!

title: An awesome day, with fantastic service
desc: Couldn't have asked for a better or smoother experience yesterday. As a first-time, impromptu MC for the bride and groom everything went well. Much thanks to Ken, our coordinator, for his exceptional work. His attentiveness and good communications skills allowed me to do my job, and allowed the bride and groom to focus on their special day. A special thanks to one of the waiters, James, very friendly, easy to talk to, and mindful given we had a baby at the table. Give that man a raise, please! Hosting a wedding at St. Regis Singapore is a strong recommendation from me.

title: Fantastic dining at St Regis Caroline Mansion
desc: Wonderful time while dine in at St Regis Caroline Mansion. All the food were absolutely delicious. Ken, the banquet in charge , was super attentive and friendly. He made the experience perfect. He brought out the food all at the same time and brought me anything I asked for. Would definitely come back to this place!

title: Very good experience
desc: It‚Äôs fantastic experience staying in St Regis. The service is good and hotel room is spacious and good. The breakfast is good as well even though sometime you will need to wait due to limited table number. I want to also highlight a chef called Kamal, he is very nice and always come to play with my kid and ask what we need during the dining period. We appreciate this good service and my kid is happy as well. Overall it‚Äôs a wonderful experience and recommend.

title: Awesome place!
desc: We really enjoyed our stay. The place is very family friendly. This is our second time staying here at St Regis. The front office team are very welcoming and pleasant. Checking-in is a breeze. We would like to commend buttler Froel for his excellent service. He is very cordial and friendly and goes the extra mile to ensure a very pleasant guest experience. We thank the whole buttler team as well for the complimentary birthday cake for our son who celebrates his birthday today. We will definetly return for another staycation. Excellent team!

title: Impressive hotel!
desc: My family stayed in this hotel for one night. Room size is big and nice. Toilet and showers are separated and bed was great to sleep in. Breakfast buffet was the usual but they fill up the food fast as there was a crowd that morning. We left a bag when we checked out and called to enquire. They have kept it for us. Impressed with their service.

title: Stay and breakfast in St Regis
desc: Fantastic stay at St Regis Singapore! Breakfast spread was great and we were attended by a very detailed and hardworking gentlemen Saravanan. Appreciate his efforts to accommodate our requests throughout the breakfast service!

title: Exquisite dinner at Brasserie Les Saveurs
desc: Had an excellent dinner at Brasserie Les Saveurs Astor Grill popup üòÄ Thank You for the 3 servers for making our dinner special. Especially to Mr. Hucksen for his detail knowledge of the Astor Grill's food üòã

title: 16 - 18 June 2023 St Regis Stay
desc: The staff and hotel coordinators are very professional, helpful and approachable in helping us with all the wedding preparation and execution. 5* rating for their effort and professionalism. Would highly recommend for couples to do their wedding at this hotel.

title: Great brunch and service
desc: Awesome food at the Sunday brunch and great and smiley service from Saravanan! Ambience was also great with a jazz band playing all the greatest hits! All in all what a great and relaxed Sunday experience for me and my wife

title: Awesome experience
desc: There was a good spread at the seafood brunch. The chocolate √©clairs were my favourite. The restaurant's service was very warm and hospitable. Two free glasses of champagne were also thrown in. Music was also nice and there was a live band. Special shutout to Kartie and Saravanan.

title: Brunch
desc: Great experience and fresh seafood, lobster was on point. Wide range of deserts. Main course was average but good seafood choice. Free parking too and great live music. Our waiter, Saravanan was very polite too

title: Great dinner
desc: Had a casual dinner at Brasserie Les Saveurs and tried the new Astor grill menu. Food is well prepared. Lobster is fresh and tender. The service team - Kartie, Jessa and Summer are excellent - great attention to details and warm. Will come back again soon.

title: Amazing day at Regis
desc: Very amazing experience with my husband here. Can find super fresh seafood and dessert is definitely worth trying. I like the service and live singing here as well, thanks for Saravanan‚Äôs service that make the day with more happiness with family.

title: Superb Sunday brunch
desc: Superb Sunday brunch. Lots of choice, plenty of seafoods, wide range of desserts with chef‚Äôs specials interspersed. Great service and friendly staff. We chose the champagne option and were not disappointed.

title: Can never go wrong at a St. Regis
desc: I live at the St Regis Residence, and the service is as impeccable as the hotel. The staff is hands down top-notch! One of the reasons I‚Äôve enjoyed visiting the hotel is the afternoon tea and classic, opulent surroundings. It‚Äôs always an excellent choice for dinner, an evening cocktail at Astor, or a weekend getaway.

title: A Fab Stay All Around
desc: Had a really nice stay at the St Regis yesterday. The living room areas are slightly outdated but the beds are extremely comfortable, and the bathroom is beautiful. We had brunch at The Astor Hall which includes a buffet of mainly seafood (crab, shrimp, sushi etc) and an a la carte menu. The food was all really tasty and the service was great. Our server Saravanan was exceptional, extremely attentive and so friendly and hospitable. He was a true professional and great at his job! The jazz band playing to the room set the atmosphere perfectly.

title: Hotel with great breakfast
desc: Always enjoy the experience of staying at this hotel and look forward to the breakfast spread. Best laksa in town, served by one of the friendliest chefs around. The rooms are spacious. Location is also quite convenient and within walking distance to Singapore Botanic Garden

title: Great stay-cation (but missing elements)
desc: Very nice stay - rooms are well kept and very spacious, got busy but never felt overcrowded. Fantastic Orchard road location that even locals can enjoy being a 'tourist' in. Butler service provided a good cup of tea and coffee in-room in the morning. Minor quibbles 1) Spa opens at 10am and closes at 7pm - including sauna / steam - for hotel guests too. No reason provided. Staffing shortage? Pool also closes at 7pm 2) Breakfast had an extensive spread, but no main dish was a hit - tried the pancakes (undercooked), eggs benedict (overcooked) and avo toast (meh...). Wife left her share mostly untouched 3) No express checkout in lobby

title: Great Stay at St. Regis, Singapore/ Thank you Chef Kamal Hossen!
desc: Excellent hotel with great facilities. Room was large and well appointed. Great little bar on the main floor. The breakfast at the hotel has an outstanding spread of dishes with much variety. A special thanks to Chef Kamal Hossen who prepared delicious items for breakfast, including an excellent array of dishes from the Indian cuisine. Great job!!

title: A gem in the city!
desc: My husband and I found everything about this hotel to be a 5* experience. From check in to check out, the staff is friendly and helpful. They know your name after your first encounter and greet you by name every time after. The staff could not be more helpful. We used our Suite Night Upgrade and were able to get in the Caroline Aster Suite. The room is quite large, comfortable and well appointed. It also comes with complimentary cocktails in the Astor Bar each afternoon and we had a view of the botanical gardens. The breakfast buffet was very good and the staff was extraordinary. Whoever is training this staff is doing an excellent job. I saw other reviews complaining about the wait for breakfast. We never had that experience, nor saw a wait line. We would not hesitate to

title: Service 100!
desc: I dined in this pop up Astor Grill with my friend just recently. Given the food was scrumptious, but the service given by jessa, jovan and kartie was exceptional! Very accommodating staffs! Although, they have another tables to attend to, they made sure that they will accommodate each one of us during that night. Will definitely come back here. Great food and fantastic dining experience! üëåüèªüëåüèªüëåüèª

title: Not 5 star
desc: This is a good 4* hotel but is far away from the true luxury I would expect from a 5* establishment. There are some things which were excellent: -Concierge very helpful. -Very pleasant lobby area. -Good sized rooms. -Complimentary pressing of two items per person per day is fantastic and we made good use of this. The negatives : -When we checked in, we were told by the staff member handling the check-in that even though the rate we booked did not include the cost of breakfast, they were delighted to confirm that they had upgraded us to the breakfast rate free of charge and therefore could enjoy breakfast at no extra cost. We were very pleased. However, on check-out I was surprised to see that in fact daily breakfast had been included on my itemized bill. When I relayed to the

title: Lovely place to be!
desc: I had a great night with many eccentric and hilarious moments with my friends, chef and service staffs. Sat at a well reserved area with superb ambience and comfort. Chef Angelo came out from kitchen and interacted with us and other guests about the food prepared by him and his team. It‚Äôs not just a western food paradise, but also like a gala night (mentioned by my friend aka birthday boy) and Juvan helped us to take many beautiful photos with perfect lightings. Kartie served us too. Would be back to try when the new menu comes! :) we also headed to Astor Bar for a drink, Dee Pak was really hilarious and recommended us the drinks!

title: Great experience!
desc: Had a great dinning experience at St. Regis for dinner last night prepared by Chef Angelo! Steak was cooked to perfection (medium-rare). We also had the privileged to be served by experienced Juvan and Kartie both who were so attentive towards our needs and provided top notched service! Special thanks to Gary for also recommending this place and food to us! Headed to Astor Bar after dinner and had awesome Dee Pak making our drinks for us! It‚Äôs a place you wouldn‚Äôt want to miss dropping by ;) Overall a great experience and would definitely be back again!

title: Not quite the expected six-star experience
desc: Not quite what I was expecting from a six-star experience at this price point and an internationally recognised brand marketed with its award winning butler service. Check in was already rather chaotic and during the wait time we were offered by the floor manager to order coffee during the wait which will be delivered to the room as soon as it was ready... order never did come along and on reminder to the butler (note the butler hotline is always busy) we were told our orders were not in the selection (i.e. no iced coffee drinks) when this was not told to us earlier. Later multiple hits and misses with butler service which needed constant reminders such as reminders for them to return to pickup shoes for the shoe polishing etc. Understandably the level of service is down to each

title: Memorable Wedding Proposal Thanks to Wonderful Staff
desc: Hi, would like to send my compliments to the St Regis staff for helping me plan my wedding proposal. They have been extremely helpful and went the extra mile to make sure my stay is a pleasant and memorable one. Greatest shout outs to Nicholas of the front desk for taking his time to show me the rooms. He was extremely patiently, helpful and very kind to share tips on how to get my proposal plan going. Also kudos to Edwin of the Cluster Reservations team for helping to arrange my pre-visit, and Fiona from Yan Ting Restaurant also for being extremely kind and diligent in helping me with my queries and reservations. With their help, the wedding proposal was a success and an extremely memorable one!

title: Wedding Banquet at St Regis on 15th July 2023 Dinner
desc: I had a great time at the wedding banquet at marc jacobs ballroom! I was part of the wedding planning team and was very glad to work with Banquet Manager Ken who is cery dedicated and professional! He was very helpful and very knowledgeable when comes to handling situations! Thank you so much!

title: Review of the chef , hotel , rooms , service ,
desc: Great work by chef sumanth, very good service by the chef and good spread at the breakfast ! I would definitely recommend to my friends and family .good room service Friendly staff Good ambience!!

title: Luxurious Accomodation
desc: The St Regis Singapore is a 5 star hotel nestled into the heart of Orchard . My mom and I were met with a very warm welcome of Tiara on the front desk.. Our butlers Froel and Erwin are exceptionally friendly and attentive to all our needs. They will go out of their way to ensure that our stay is a pleasant and memorable one. A special thanks to Jen, Jo and Fatima of F&B and Uncle Mescon for a great and sumptous experience at Brasserie La Saveur, fine dining at its best. The bed rooms are all elegant from the design to very high standard. Bed was very comfortable. Coffee machine, well stocked with Nespresso capsules and TWG tea, mini bar, water, turn down service with macarons, chocolates and fruits. Views were fantastic from the room we stayed with fabulous views over

title: Business dinner at Brasserie Les Saveurs
desc: Hosted a business dinner for 12 at Brasserie Les Saveurs. The manager Kartie Gunuzalan was amazing in the way he arranged and managed the event. Food was great. Atmosphere was conducive. Will definitely host business meals there again.

title: Luxury hotel with good staff but some issues
desc: The St Regis Singapore feels luxurious in some ways, as expected in a 5 star hotel - however, during our stay we encountered a few problems. First the good things - The rooms are decently appointed and large. I liked the bathrooms especially - double sink areas, a large soaking tub and separate shower - with a really nice spa shower fixture. The rooms have nice furnishings and plush bedding. The hotel was in a decent location - not perfect, since as other have noted it is near Orchard Street stores but requires an extra 5 min walk from other hotels that are right on the main street. The bad: When we first checked in, we encountered a problem with our rooms, but I will say that Candy the front desk manager handled the situation perfectly and helped us out right away. But

title: Wonderful dinner at Astor Grill
desc: Our dinner at Astor Grill in St Regis was delicious and beautifully served. The steak and lamb was tender, and the sticky pudding was splendid. Our hosts Kartie and Juvan were extremely friendly and polite, making the experience very pleasant and memorable. They even gave us a birthday cake after they noticed us wishing my dad a happy birthday. We felt very welcomed :)

title: Good food
desc: We stayed at St. Regis. We tried the restaurant Brasserie. Food was fantastic and the lunch set was only $50 for a three courses set. Both steak and fish were very good. Waiter Saravanan was very attentive and made us very welcomed

title: AWESOME
desc: I attended a wedding held on 15 Jul Noon. Cedric and his staffs were attentive and helpful to assist with our request. Their services were tip top, ensuring that our food were served properly. All his staff were polite and friendly.

title: 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è
desc: Stayed for one night. The room was spacious and the bed was extremely comfortable. The breakfast spread at Brasserie Les Saveur was scrumptious, and our host Saravanan was attentive, polite and professional.

title: Make the Astor Grill pop-up permanent
desc: Had an excellent experience at the St Regis while dining at the Astor Grill for dinner. We understand from the service team that the current three month pop-up is intended to test a new concept before fully transitioning the space previously used for Brasserie Les Saveurs. The menu options are intentionally curated and the dishes we were served were exquisite. We ordered the beef tartare, ribeye, tenderloin, sides of mash and spinach, and tiramisu for dessert. If considering dessert, the deconstructed tiramisu is definitely worth a try. Our recent meal at the Astor Grill demonstrated that luxury has survived the pandemic at the St Regis. We were treated to an experience of quiet classy elegance that surpassed my past experiences as an in-house guest of the hotel. Small touches

title: Highly recommended Sunday Brunch
desc: Amazing Sunday champagne brunch at the Brasserie Les Saveur with a live jazz band and an impressive selection of seafood, hors d'oeuvre and pastries. Highly recommend the lamb rack as the main course and many thanks to Inna and Saravanan for the attentive service and making our birthday celebration so special!

title: Wonderful dining experience
desc: We dine in for dinner with friends at 2nd July, the ambience was amazing, other than that, i want to give a big thanks for Alvin, Jessa and Juvan‚Äôs service, we had a great time here, also really enjoyed the food as well!

title: Good dining experience !
desc: Jessa,Juvan,Alvin, all of them are so kindly, friendly and made our first time dining experience so excellent! Desserts are also good too. I love the lemon tart, is sour enough to me, and the drink is also good. If I come to Singapore next time, I‚Äôll bring my family to here for dining again! Thank you for all of your service!

title: Great service nice food
desc: Great service provided by Jessa Juvan, and Alvin !!!! The atmosphere was on point, food was delicious and nicely presented!! The dessert Mont Blanc was so good. We had a really good time here at the stake house !! Will definitely come back in the future!!!

title: Wedding Dinner
desc: Today I attended my nephew‚Äôs wedding, the environment of the ballroom was huge and beautifully the food was good and yummy. Special thanks to Ken and Dong Qin for providing the excellent service. I would not hesitate to recommend their excellent good altitudes of work to all who may need them.

title: Booked meeting room for business meeting
desc: Good and quick service from Preetivi and her waitressing staff. Food is also nice. The service was impeccable. We enjoyed our meeting here. Only con is the aircon is freezing and centralised in the meeting rooms.

title: Service no different than being in Starbucks. Other establishments do better.
desc: Bought cake from the Drawing Room, had to bring everything back to the table myself . Waiter poured us a glass of water but didn't bother to ask if we wanted hot or cold water. Just poured something. Even establishments/restaurants like Swensens know how to ask if customers prefer hot/cold water. Disgraceful.

title: Great wedding lunch
desc: Overall a great wedding luncheon. Really good food especially the jing du pork rib and the cod fillet. Great service staff as well by Samuel and Sofia. Thanks! Would think that all guests had a great time and overall happy conversations all around in caroline mansion

title: Comfy stay at the St Regis
desc: Very classy hotel with spacious rooms. High quality linen and the mattress also really comfortable. The breakfast is just amazing. The variety of food at the buffet is incredible. Fresh juices, fruits, salads, Asian soups, breads and viennoiseries, cheese, ‚Ä¶. are among the choice but there is much more to discover that we didn‚Äôt eat the whole day. The chef is looking after the guests with great care. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Breakfast at the St Regis
desc: SARAVANAN was very attentive and gave us very good service during breakfast and was very friendly. the food buffet was really lovely and you could order from the a la carte, and the hotel stuff was lovely. Very good!

title: A cozy and warm stay in St Regis Singapore
desc: Thank you Vincent Si for taking care of my stay with my mum and daughter. When I requested for room upgrade to St Regis Suite Room, he did monitoring the room availability and upgrade on the second day. His patience and kindness made my stay amazing! He also took initiative to ask if I need any welcome drink and other assistance which made me feel so cozy

title: Sunday Brunch
desc: It's hard to know where to start..... What a wonderful dining experience! The standard and variety of food on offer was remarkable, this is an experience (and a meal) not to be missed!! For those who enjoy their wine, you will mot be disappointed.

title: Great stay
desc: Great stay and service by Saravanan during breakfast! Was an attentive server. The breakfast range is decent and the epicurean omelette was really good. I love the gyoza and the hashbrowns were a delight!

title: Not a 5/6 Star Experience
desc: My partner and I stayed at the St Regis Singapore between 8 - 13 Aug 2023. This was a rewards redemption booking for 5 nights. We booked the basic room and got upgraded to the Penthouse King Room which we really appreciated. There was good recognition of elite status at check in. The room was spacious and opulently decked out as you'd expect from a St. Regis Hotel. Unfortunately the stay should have been so much more than what we experienced for a once celebrated Singapore Hotel. The staff really make the hotel stay. All the butlers we encountered were efficient and friendly. We had spoken to a number during our elevator trips who were delightful to chat with. Several issues during our stay 1. Breakfast situation - this is in shambles. After 9am, there is often a 5-10 table

title: Exceptional hotel and gracious Staff
desc: Tiara from the Front Desk team saved our vacation after we found original property was under renovations. This lovely professional showed concern and care to show us room, arrange bookings and Elite benefits for 6 night stay. Tiara continued to interact thru out stay with tips and assistance. Butler Services was terrific and speedy with any request at anytime - I.e: 3a. Every staff interaction was pleasant beyond words. Gobi at Concierge was helpful for several requests. Spacious room well equipped for restful stay. Can‚Äôt say enough about the St. Regis.

title: Preparation and attention to craft
desc: The food and preparation felt like it took time and effort. The meticulous craft really showed via it‚Äôs taste and presentation In particular Kartie service was fantastic. Really took time to also give us quality service.

After a wait of 1 hour (past the official check in time of 3pm), the check-in staff came to me with the keys and apologized for the delay as she had been attending to other guests - which seems to suggest that the keys had been ready earlier. I'm not asking to cut the queue - I had done my fair share of queueing before reaching the front desk staff, and after registration, was asked to wait at the coffee hour as the room was not yet

title: Excellent Hotel - one of the best in Singapore (probably weithin top 5)
desc: Excellent Hotel in Singapore - we stayed the first time in St. Regis (usually Ritz Carlton), but this Hotel is equally good. Not such a great location, but still conveniently located at the beginning of Orchard Road. St Regis Hotel is an excellent Service - every request was dealt with in a very short time frame and staff is exceptionally friendly. Rooms are nice and truly enjoyed our 12 days in this Hotel in Singapore.

title: Enjoying my birthday trip
desc: St. Regis hotel just stolen my heart. I came in the evening for check-in, there was Mr. Dave and one lady (sorry I forgot her name). They gave me very warm welcome, and surprisingly he gave me as special gesture for my birthday. I felt safe and nothing to be worry even tho I travelled alone, all staff re helpful and taking care of me.. especially there are butler services.. Thank you for memorable birthday celebrations. P.s. I attached my birthday amenities, I really enjoyed even tho there was wrong salutations but I understood ü§ûonce again thank you and St. Regis just beyond my expectations üòç

title: Great for Lunch on Weekdays
desc: Great value for money on the set lunch on weekdays. Had the beef and barramundi. And appetisers were nice. Good service by Saravanan, careful and polite. Will visit again! Nice ambience, great music too.

title: Enjoyable Lunch experience
desc: Tried set lunch menu here w my friends. Super nice n value for money. Special thanks to chef Wendy, Inna, Prakash n Saravanan for their excellent service. Restaurant ambiance is comfortable w high ceiling n pool view, highly recommended

title: Poor management of breakfast
desc: Nice hotel in general. Good location. Rooms okey. But their handling of breakfast is terrible. At two occasions - total of four mornings - we had to wait close to 30 minutes for a table. We were two persons so not very difficult to fit in. First time we were told it was temporary. But second time, we understood it is a constant problem. If you are in a hurry - such as for business - chose another location. If you want to remain hungry or have 30 minutes to spend every morning, chose this hotel.

title: Amazing stay
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at this beautiful hotel. A special thanks to Dave at reception who is a real ambassador for the property. He tried to allocate our room with interconnecting door as well as arranged extra bed for complimentary. The rooms are very spacious, well appointed and clean. The Concierge team were always helpful, polite and willing to assist Whenever/Whatever needed. Buffet Breakfast was great. All in all a wonderful stay and we would definitely return on our next trip to Singapore.

title: Excellent
desc: Rooms are spacious and elegant. Bernice Chee and Jennifer Yong are the epitome of Service Excellence with their commitment and dedication. Garan and Eric at Banquet helped smooth our meeting needs. Thank you all for making our event a success!

title: Wedding Lunch at Caroline‚Äôs Mansion
desc: Held our wedding celebration at Caroline‚Äôs Mansion at St Regis and had absolutely no regrets! On the day, everything ran smoothly and according to plan thanks to Sofia and her team. Guests gave feedback that the food was great and the venue was lovely! Huge thanks also to Sifeng who assisted the bride and was always on the ball, helping to make it a stress free big day :)

title: Amazing Food & Service.
desc: My friends and I had the pleasure of being served by Juvan & Kartie at Brasserie Les Saveurs. They checked if we had any dietary restrictions & were very attentive to our needs. We were impressed with their product knowledge and food recommendations. Kudos & first class to both gentlemen.

title: wedding dinner
desc: very good attending wedding I experienced good service good food good ambience we are delighted with the service of Ken & Jazerine who served our table. wedding went very well & we enjpy so.much thank you

title: Superb Lunch Service!
desc: Inna and Prakash was superb, excellent service from all aspects. Would recommend them to each and every future guest who will dine here in Astor Grill. Food was great, Chef Mark introduce our food with great enthusiasm. Thanks for the lovely experience.

title: Successful Event at St Regis Hotel ‚ù§Ô∏èüëèüèª
desc: The account manager Cheryl and the Banquet Team Cheska were so helpful and kind to support our board meeting for the last 2 weeks (Aug 31-Sep 1, Sep 6-7) . title: Great experience at the event

title: Good Wedding Experience
desc: Very grateful to be working with KEN and Thomas for wedding. They provide the best support, readily assist to all the wedding‚Äôs needs. Their vast experience in wedding definitely put couples in good hands.

title: Very good service and well-knowledge on thier menu and would suggest very nice food.
desc: I would like to recommend 3 waitress during my dinner visit.Jen,Jess and fatima did a very good job in their service and very kind enough to help quite alot during the my dinner. Well-done and keep up to great service. I would highly recommend to them to my friend if were they visit over here..

title: Enjoyable food experience
desc: Awesome food. Wonderful and attentive service.. The lobster was succulent. The lamb rack was lovely and tender. The Alaska desert was wonderful. The Alaska desert serving portion can feed between 4 to 6.

title: Great Business Event at St. Regis
desc: Had a great event at St. Regis conference room with our business partner and clients. Nice set up, the floor manager Sofia is responsible, helpful and attentive. Would love to go back on our upcoming events.

title: HEARTFELT THANKS TO THE ST REGIS SINGAPORE TEAM!!!
desc: I would like to send our gratitude to the St Regis Singapore team for making my daughter's wedding on 23rd Sept 23' at the John Jacob Ballroom, so smooth sailing and successful. We are grateful and thrilled on how everything turned out! Michelle had been a great support to us, working tirelessly behind the scenes for the past year to ensure that all worked according to our preference. She would always reply promptly even responding on weekends or late in the night, providing us good recommendations / suggestions and feedback when necessary. The entire planning and setup went so smoothly, and we knew that it would not have happened without Michelle and the wonderful St Regis team support. We are so proud and happy as we continue to receive comments from our guests, from

title: Fit for a Queen!
desc: St. Regis Singapore is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed at. The hotel is so luxurious from its beautiful chandeliers at the entrance to the exquisite rooms. Upon entering the room, I was already amazed by the look and feel of it. The completeness of the bar, the lounging couch and the comfortable bed were just all awesome. The bathroom with such a beautiful bath tub made me feel like a queen. The 24 hour subtler service was superb. We had the most attentive and friendlist butlers - Froel and Durai, who were just so excellent! Highly recommended!

title: Great food and service!
desc: We came for lunch at Astor Grill. It was fantastic! The food was brilliant and the service by Saravanan Kartie was top notch. The seating was very comfortable, the seating was classical, and the service was the best I‚Äôve had in Singapore. We will be back. Thanks Saravanan Kartie

title: Great staycation
desc: We stayed at st regis as a staycation for my husband's birthday. It was great. The room was very comfortable, great bed, black out curtains, no noise at all (we were on one of the upper floors). We enjoyed the sauna and jacuzzi facilities. Kudos to the friendly staff for breakfast, very attentive service (thank you Kartii Saravanan!). Small con: I feel the hotel could do more to prevent unnecessary plastic waste for water bottles...

title: Comfortable hotel needing a bit of service upgrade.
desc: This is a beautiful hotel walking distance or a short taxi ride to all the sights and shopping in Singapore. The rooms are well appointed and large and the shower was amazing. The service needs some attention. For example, at breakfast we sat down and ordered a tea and a coffee. After 15 minutes I got up and asked again....finally showed up. Then I ordered eggs, same problem. I reminded them and waited another 10 and decided to leave (we were now running late). At check out the front desk called to see if our bags were ready, they were so we left them and went to the lobby to meet them and our car and the bags never showed. Again, I needed to go inside and ask again. Lovely hotel and lovely people....I think the service needs a bit of shoring up but other than that, we
